name: Cup (chisenoa, Kizilejderha)
description:
Greetings!

Cup is a minimalist chess-like game where you fight against your opponent to get the most cups on the playing field

Does It Have a Story?

I hate stories :)

This game was made in 48 hours with Roots theme for Global Game Jam 2023

Controls

Click: LMB
Restart Game: F5
You will need your Brain

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like chess-like games
• People in the Global Game Jam Community
• Girls in the two girls one cup
• My friends who are curious about the game i made
• IDK

System Requirements

You can even play on a Cup

Credits

Alperen Güner - Game Designer
Alperen Güner - Programmer
Alperen Güner - 3D Artist
Yusuf Kızılkaya - Musician
Güven Gürünlü - Efes Pilsener
